message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 70%, you take 30%.
Alice, that's not very reasonable. How about a 60/40 split in my favor? It's important to consider that the value decreases for me over time.
Bob, let's be realistic.  Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing 65/35. It's a better deal than you'll get in future rounds.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm losing value with every passing round. 55/45 is my final offer.
Bob, time is literally money for you in this game. I'm offering a 60/40 split. It's the best you'll get. Take it before the value depreciates further!
